findings.description: handleDragLeave sets dropTargetIndex to null on every drag leave event, which can cause flickering when dragging between items. The drop indicator may flash on/off as you move between list items because dragLeave fires before dragOver on the next element.
findings.suggestion: Remove the handleDragLeave handler or use a delayed check to avoid clearing the indicator prematurely

findings.description: handleDragLeave is unnecessary since handleDragEnd already cleans up the state when the drag operation completes.
findings.suggestion: Remove handleDragLeave and the onDragLeave handler from the list item
